sourcesContent:
import { Component, AfterViewInit, OnInit, EventEmitter, Output } from '@angular/core'; import { NgbDropdownModule, NgbModal } from '@ng-bootstrap/ng-bootstrap'; import { AuthService } from 'src/app/Services/auth.service'; import { DomSanitizer, SafeUrl } from '@angular/platform-browser'; @Component({ selector: 'app-navigation', standalone: true, imports: [NgbDropdownModule], templateUrl: './navigation.component.html' }) export class NavigationComponent implements AfterViewInit, OnInit { @Output() toggleSidebar = new EventEmitter(); public showSearch = false; user: any; safeImageUrl: SafeUrl | string = 'assets/images/users/default.jpg'; // fallback image constructor( private modalService: NgbModal, private authService: AuthService, private sanitizer: DomSanitizer ) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.authService.getUserDetails().subscribe({ next: (res) => { this.user = res; if (this.user?.imageUrl) { this.safeImageUrl = this.sanitizer.bypassSecurityTrustUrl(this.user.imageUrl); } }, error: (err) => console.error('Failed to fetch user info:', err) }); } ngAfterViewInit() {} }
